basics.label: Data Scientist | Project Manager | Industrial Chemical Engineer | Data Engineer
basics.summary: Innovative and results-driven professional with a solid background in Industrial Chemical Engineering and experience in project management, data science, and data engineering. I have skills in managing complex projects, improving operational efficiency, and creating innovative, data-driven solutions to industry problems. My skills include advanced analytics, machine learning, regulatory compliance, and team leadership, all of which I have successfully utilized to drive impact. I am capable and experienced with extracting data to identify trends, mitigate risks, and drive continuous improvement. By combining technical acumen in tools like SQL, Python, R, Tableau, and cloud platforms with strong leadership and communication skills, I thrive in dynamic environments that demand innovative strategies and cross-functional collaboration. Passionate about bridging the gap between engineering and data science, I am committed to fostering excellence, promoting safety and quality, and delivering transformative solutions that make a lasting impact in the industry.
